text: The Race Between the Tortoise and the Hare.
The Hare was very fast and proud.
translation: 兔子跑得非常快，而且很自傲。

text: The Tortoise was very slow and steady.
translation: 烏龜跑得很慢，但很穩健。

text: Hare: I will win this race easily!
translation: 兔子：我會輕而易舉地贏得這場比賽！

text: Tortoise: We will see about that.

translation: 兔子跑到了前面很遠的地方。

text: Hare: I am so tired. I will take a nap.
translation: 兔子：我好累喔，我要睡個小覺。

text: The Hare fell fast asleep under a tree.
translation: 兔子在樹下沉沉地睡著了。

text: Step by step, the Tortoise kept walking.
translation: 烏龜一步接著一步，不停地走著。
他經過了正在睡覺的兔子。

text: The Tortoise reached the finish line first!
translation: 烏龜竟然先到達了終點線！

text: Hare: Oh no! Slow and steady wins the race!
translation: 兔子：喔不！穩紮穩打才是贏家！
